data.title: Fun and Entertaining
data.text: They put on some great productions that are very well presented.  The casts are always very energetic.  It is a fun and reasonably priced to attend.

data.title: we saw e burlesque and it was great family entertainment. can't wait for the next visit I'll be going later this week
data.text: great entertainment. small theatre where every seat is good and great value for the price. Who say there's nothing to do in the High Desert!

data.title: Theater + Art Gallery
data.text: The art gallery is only open before theater shows and during intermissions.  Theater has a wide variety of different groups who use the theater and perform.

data.title: Good , solid theater performances in a historic venue
data.text: this is my second time to watch a performance here..both during the christmas season with my family..both shows were memorable..the audience was not large but very enthusiastic..the christmas play was called " a christmas debt" , an epilogue to a christmas carol..written by a local playwright..with a large talented cast...they were all great performers..but it was great to see the child actors and actresses..it was a musical..the set was not that elaborate but the performance made up for it..some of the scenes spilled into the in and around the front rows, enjoing the crowd to participate..it was a good experience for my young kids and nice to get them away from the gadgets and the tv...
